name: Escape the Monsters
description:
Its like Escape from Tarkov but as an rpg. 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse Left Click: Attack
Space : Dashing

ESC: Open inventory
In Inventory : 
Mouse Left Click: Drop Item
Mouse Right Click: Use Item if possible or equip it

Note

Feel free to try the bugfix edition, since the enemies on this version wont do any damage and your stuff is getting resetted after a run. https://rhewid.itch.io/escape-the-monsters-bugfix

Side Note:

Didnt have the time due to Covid :/ to make this a non-rushed, polished game. Hoping for some feedback on this mini-mvp of a game!
